description:
The Errand Rat Youkai is a small anthropomorphic rat youkai who wears a kimono. He is a member of the http://anidb.net/ch37613 [Kyuuso Clan] and told http://anidb.net/ch15458 [Rikuo] he witnessed http://anidb.net/ch15459 [Kana] and http://anidb.net/ch19473 [Yura] being kidnapped.
Source: Nurarihyon no Mago Wiki
name: Tsukai Nezumi
